metadata.title: CVE-2018-9543 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In trim_device of f2fs_format_utils.c, it is possible that the datapartition is not wiped during a factory reset. This could lead to localinformation disclosure after factory reset with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-112868088.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
